servinfo.title: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like pop corn popping
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model and Engine Basic Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

condition.ptxt: Excessive detonation – Engine makes continuously sharp metallic knocks that change with throttle opening. Sounds like pop corn popping

ptxt.intxref: Spark Plug Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Loose connection of high-tension cord (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Clogged fuel filter (faulty fuel pump) or fuel lines

action.ptxt: Fuel Pressure Check:For Petrol Engine Model or Fuel Pump and Its Circuit Check:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Air drawn in through intake manifold or throttle body gasket

ptxt.intxref: EGR Valve Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Poor performance of knock sensor, ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High:For Petrol Engine Model , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ptxt.intxref: Fuel Injector Circuit Check:For Petrol Engine Model

action.ptxt: Pistons, Piston Rings, Connecting Rods and Cylinders Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine or Cylinders, Pistons and Piston Rings Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT and/or Piston Pins and Connecting Rods Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: Oil Control Valve Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
